pages.text: Usa dina sara adhikara sirafa alaha da hovega. Uha unham de vicakara phaisala karega. Tam jihare loka imana li'a'e ate cage karama kite, uha ni'amata de bagam vica honage
Ate jil'ha ne avigi'a kiti ate sadi'am a'itam tom inakara kita tam unham la'i apamanajanaka dada hai
Ate jinha lokam ne alaha de raha vica apana ghara bara chada dita, phira unham di hati'a kara diti ga'i jam uha mara ga'e, alaha zarura unham nu cagi rozi devega
Ate besaka alaha hi sabha tom cagi rozi dena vala hai. Uha unham nu ajihe sathana te pahucavega, jithe uha satrasata honage. Ate besaka alaha janana vala ate sahinasila hai

Iha ho li'a. Ate jihara bada usa taram hi badala lave jivem usa nala kita gi'a si. Ate phira usa upara zulama kita jave, tam alaha usa di madada karega. Besaka alaha mu'afi dena vala ate narami tom kama laina vala hai
Iha isa la'i ki alaha rata nu dina vica ate dina nu rata vica dakhila karada hai. Alaha sunana vala ate dekhana vala hai
Iha isa la'i ki alaha hi saca hai ate baki sabha asata hai jisa nu loka pukarade hana, alaha nu chada ke. Besaka alaha hi sabha tom upara hai ate vada hai
Ki tusim nahim vekhade ki alaha ne asamana tom pani barasa'i'a. Phira dharati hari bhari ho ga'i. Besaka alaha dugha'i taka janana vala hai ate khabara rakhana vala hai
Use da hai jo kujha asamanam vica hai ate jo kujha dharati vica hai. Besaka alaha hi hai. Jihara beparavaha hai ate prasasa vala hai
